Papers for the BIG Summer Program

30 Jun 2018

Reading time ~1 minute

Methylation Biomarker papers

  • DNA methylation age of human tissues and cell types.
  • Genome-wide methylation profiles reveal quantitative views of human aging, Hannum et al.
  • DNA methylation signatures in peripheral blood strongly predict all-cause mortality, Zhang et al.
  • Blood-based profiles of DNA methylation predict the underlying distribution of cell types, Koestler et al.
  • Epigenome-wide association study of body mass index, and the adverse outcomes of adiposity, Whal et al.
  • Lactase nonpersistence is directed by DNA-variation-dependent epigenetic aging, Labrie et al.
  • A DNA methylation biomarker of alcohol consumption, Liu et al.
  • Smoking-Associated DNA Methylation Biomarkers and Their Predictive Value for All-Cause and Cardiovascular Mortality, Zhang et al.
  • DNA Methylation Changes in Whole Blood and CD16+ Neutrophils in Response to Chronic Folic Acid Supplementation in Women of Childbearing Age GSE63499 Vitamin D
  • Male fertility status is associated with DNA methylation signatures in sperm and transcriptomic profiles of bovine preimplantation embryos, Kropp et. al.
  • DNA methylation signatures of chronic low-grade inflammation are associated with complex diseases, Ligthart et al.
  • Epigenome-wide association study (EWAS) on lipids: the Rotterdam Study, Braun et al.
  • DNA methylation signatures in peripheral blood strongly predict all-cause mortality, Zhang et al.
  • An epigenetic biomarker of aging for lifespan and healthspan, Levine et al.
